data.title: Transfer Bucharest To/From Giurgiu Cruise Port
data.meta_description: Set out on a smooth journey between Bucharest and Giurgiu Cruise Port with our premium transfer service, ensuring a stress-free transition from city to port.
data.text:
Set out on a smooth journey between Bucharest and Giurgiu Cruise Port with our premium transfer service, ensuring a stress-free transition from city to port. From the comfort of a Mercedes-Benz E Class vehicle equipped with modern amenities to the convenience of a meet and greet service, every aspect of your transfer is thoughtfully catered to. Stay tuned to discover how our seamless transfer service can elevate your travel experience effortlessly.

Good To Know

Image Credit: Viator.com

Private Mercedes-Benz E Class transport available.

Operating hours from 05:00 AM to 10:00 PM.

Hotel pickup and drop-off included.

Flexible booking options with free cancellation.

Luggage restrictions of 1 suitcase and 1 carry-on bag per traveler.

Service Details

Image Credit: Viator.com

For those seeking a seamless transfer experience between Bucharest and Giurgiu Cruise Port, a range of impeccable services await, including hotel pickup, transport in a private Mercedes-Benz E Class or similar vehicle, and a host of amenities to enhance the journey.

Passengers can expect not only a comfortable ride but also the convenience of having road and parking taxes included. The meet and greet service with a name sign adds a personal touch, while the Wi-Fi on board ensures connectivity throughout the trip.

Plus, travelers will find a flat water bottle and a smartphone USB charger provided for their convenience. With gratuities included, guests can relax and enjoy the journey worry-free, though it’s essential to note that excess luggage charges may apply.

Pickup and Drop-off Information

Image Credit: Viator.com

Arranging convenient pickups and drop-offs is a seamless process with various options available for travelers between Bucharest and Giurgiu Cruise Port. Travelers can expect pickup points and a drop-off location in Bucharest, ensuring a hassle-free transfer experience.

Operating hours span from Monday to Sunday between 05:00 AM and 10:00 PM, accommodating a wide range of schedules. A confirmation is received at the time of booking, and while the service isn’t wheelchair accessible, it’s near public transportation for added convenience.

Luggage restrictions include 1 suitcase and 1 carry-on bag per traveler, with excess luggage charges potentially applying. With approximate transfer durations dependent on traffic, travelers can rely on this private tour/activity for their group without health restrictions.

Price and Booking

Image Credit: Viator.com

Discover the ease of securing your private transfer between Bucharest and Giurgiu Cruise Port with prices starting from $142.07 per group. The service ensures hotel pickup and drop-off, using a private vehicle like a Mercedes-Benz E Class. Road and parking taxes are included, along with a meet and greet service featuring a name sign.

Stay connected with onboard Wi-Fi, and enjoy amenities like a flat water bottle and a smartphone USB charger.

The price of $142.07 per group (up to 2 people) comes with a lowest price guarantee and the option for free cancellation up to 24 hours before the experience starts. Secure your spot with a simple reservation process that allows you to pay later.

Additional Information

Looking to travel between Bucharest and Giurgiu Cruise Port with ease and convenience? This tour operates from April 14, 2019, to July 2, 2025, offering travelers flexibility in planning their trip.

If you have questions about excess luggage or any specific needs, inquiries can be made with the operator to ensure a smooth journey. Plus, you can secure your spot with flexible booking options.

The service includes a private vehicle, Wi-Fi onboard, a flat water bottle, and a smartphone USB Charger. With gratuity already included, this transfer provides a hassle-free experience.

Travelers are advised to adhere to the luggage restrictions of 1 suitcase and 1 carry-on bag per traveler for a comfortable journey.

Accessibility and Amenities

Travelers aboard this transfer service can expect to enjoy convenient amenities and accessibility features designed to enhance their journey between Bucharest and Giurgiu Cruise Port.

While the service isn’t wheelchair accessible, passengers can benefit from onboard Wi-Fi connectivity, ensuring they stay connected throughout the trip.

Plus, a smartphone USB charger is provided, allowing travelers to keep their devices powered up.

To stay hydrated during the journey, a flat water bottle is included for each passenger.

On top of that, gratuities are already included in the service, offering a hassle-free experience.

These thoughtful amenities aim to provide a comfortable and enjoyable transfer experience for individuals traveling between Bucharest and Giurgiu Cruise Port.

Booking and Cancellation Policy

Image Credit: Viator.com

Guests can take advantage of the flexible booking and cancellation policy offered for the transfer service between Bucharest and Giurgiu Cruise Port. Travelers benefit from free cancellation up to 24 hours before the experience starts, providing peace of mind and flexibility in their plans. Plus, there is a Reserve Now and Pay Later option available, making it convenient to secure a spot without immediate payment. It’s important to note that refunds are not issued for missed tours due to the late or non-arrival of the cruise ship.

Directions From Bucharest to Giurgiu Cruise Port

Image Credit: Viator.com

For travelers heading from Bucharest to Giurgiu Cruise Port, the journey entails a scenic route spanning approximately 65 kilometers southeast of the Romanian capital.

Starting from Bucharest, travelers typically take the DN5/E60 road towards Giurgiu. This route offers picturesque views of the Romanian countryside and takes about an hour and a half to two hours to reach the cruise port, depending on traffic conditions.

Upon arrival in Giurgiu, travelers can easily locate the cruise port, situated along the Danube River. The port is well-marked and easily accessible, making it convenient for travelers to embark on their cruise adventure.

Directions From Giurgiu Cruise Port to Bucharest

Image Credit: Viator.com

Navigating from Giurgiu Cruise Port back to Bucharest is a straightforward journey that offers travelers a smooth transition from the Danube River to the vibrant Romanian capital. The most common route is via the A2 highway, which connects Giurgiu to Bucharest, approximately 64 kilometers away.

Travelers will enjoy picturesque views of the Romanian countryside along the way. Exiting the cruise port, travelers should head northeast on DN5/E60 towards Giurgiu city center. From there, merge onto the A2 highway and continue for about an hour until reaching Bucharest.

The route is well-marked, and GPS navigation can provide additional assistance. Upon arrival in Bucharest, travelers will find themselves immersed in the city’s bustling energy, ready to explore its historical landmarks and cultural attractions.

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I Request a Specific Type of Vehicle for the Transfer?

When arranging a transfer, travelers can request a specific type of vehicle, such as a Mercedes-Benz E Class or similar, for their convenience. This personalized service ensures a comfortable and tailored experience from pickup to drop-off.

Are There Rest Stops or Restroom Facilities Along the Way?

Rest stops are available along the route for restroom breaks during the transfer. Travelers can take advantage of these facilities to freshen up or stretch their legs before continuing the journey to the destination.

Is There a Guide or Commentary Provided During the Transfer?

During the transfer, a knowledgeable guide provides insightful commentary on the journey. Travelers can learn about the area’s history, culture, and landmarks, enhancing the overall experience while en route to their destination.

Can I Bring Pets or Animals on the Transfer?

Pets or animals are not permitted on the transfer service. The focus is on providing a comfortable and safe experience for passengers. Travelers are advised to make alternative arrangements for their furry companions.

Are There Any Food or Beverage Options Available During the Journey?

During the journey, travelers can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi, a flat water bottle, and a smartphone USB charger. Snacks or beverages are not provided. However, passengers are welcome to bring their own refreshments on board.

The Sum Up

Experience a hassle-free and comfortable transfer between Bucharest and Giurgiu Cruise Port with our private Mercedes-Benz E Class or similar vehicle service. Enjoy amenities like onboard Wi-Fi and a smartphone USB charger, and benefit from a meet and greet service.
